title: Court summons PTI workers in Nov 26 protest case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):An Anti-Terrorism Court (ATC) on Thursday again summoned absent PTI workers in a case pertaining to November 26, protest in the federal capital.
Judge Abual Hasanat Zulqarnain heard the case. During the hearing, the court issued summons notices to absent accused after the presence of the workers who appeared and adjourned the hearing of the three cases until September 11.
Two cases against PTI workers and leaders have been registered in Sangjani police station and one in Noon police station.
